sentences.sContent: The skyscraper towers into the clouds.
sentences.sCn: 那幢摩天大楼高耸入云。

sentences.sContent: The majesty of the skyscraper awed me .
sentences.sContent_eng: The majesty of the skyscraper awed me .
sentences.sCn: 这幢摩天大厦的雄伟气势令我惊叹。

sentences.sContent: Suddenly, a top needle of a skyscraper is pressing toward him. He fails to dodge and bumps heavily on the concrete needle.
sentences.sContent_eng: Suddenly, a top needle of a skyscraper is pressing toward him. He fails to dodge and bumps heavily on the concrete needle.
sentences.sCn: 突然，一座摩天大厦的尖型顶柱朝他逼来，他躲避不及，重重地撞在混凝土顶柱上。

trans.tranOther: a very tall modern city building
